## WeightedBlendedOIT.outputFragmentColor() method

Do the fragment color output.

**Signature:**

```typescript
outputFragmentColor(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, color: PBShaderExp): boolean;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

</td><td>

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)


</td><td>

The calculated fragment color.


</td></tr>

**Returns:**

boolean

## Remarks

This method outputs the calculated fragment color for OIT rendering and injects it into the object's material.
